mapper.select: select tradeBill.createDate, tradeBill.id, user1.userName buyerName, user2.userName sellerName, status, listedGoodsId from tradeBill,user user1,user user2 where (buyer=#{uid} or seller=#{uid}) and buyer = user1.id and seller = user2.id
mapper.update: update tradeBill set status = -1 where id = #{id}
update tradeBill set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tradeBill where buyer=#{buyer} and listedGoodsId = #{listedGoodsId} and status = 0
select max(status) from tradeBill where listedGoodsId = #{listedGoodsId}
